categories: Category:Events during the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Alderaan Peace Summit was a peace summit held by Jedi Master Sidonie Garen in an attempt to bring an end to the Alderaan Civil War amongst the Great Houses of Alderaan. However, Garen was infected by the Dark Plague, and nearly caused permanent conflict between the Houses before she was stopped by a Jedi Consular.
